name: Homeworld Defense
description: Homeword defense is a strategic game in which you will protect your planets from the waves of asteroids, find out why they appear and save your world from the threat once and for all. To protect the world, you will have to use weapons that asteroids can help you discover.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 x32 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 645M DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2048 MB available space
